text: Yā pana bhikkhunī orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 138. Should any bhikkhunī bathe at intervals of less than half a month, except at the proper occasions, it is to be confessed.
